believe_in_yourself: Believe in yourself. You are stronger than you think.
aim_high: Aim high. The stars belong to you.
be_bold: Be bold. Great adventures begin with a single step.
strength_and_courage: Strength and courage. You can overcome any obstacle.
you_are_capable: You are capable of great things. Believe in yourself.
go_and_succeed: Go and succeed. The world is within your reach.
believe_in_your_dreams: Believe in your dreams. They are the key to your future.
surpass_yourself_every_day: Surpass yourself every day. Become better.
the_future_is_yours: The future is yours. Create it in your own image.
perseverance_and_success: Perseverance and success. Never give up.
learn_and_grow: Learn and grow. Knowledge is the key.
spread_your_wings: Spread your wings. Soar to new horizons.
aim_for_excellence: Aim for excellence. Be the best.
knowledge_is_power: Knowledge is power. Use it wisely.
every_day_counts: Every day counts. Make it count.
progress_every_day: Progress every day. Move closer to your dreams.
go_to_the_end: Go to the end. The reward is worth it.
